sections.text:
79-1083.01.Reductions in school district budget; legislative intent.

It is the intent of the Legislature that any reductions in a school district budget, made to comply with the budget limitation in the Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act, affect classroom expenses as a last resort.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 299, ยง 6.

Cross ReferencesTax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act, see section 79-1001.
